ComicInfo.Title: Variations; Scienc Marches On!; A Little Night Misery; Yuletide Scamps; "Hey, Barefootz, would you like to join our consciousness-raising group?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-10 19:47:08. [CVDB329486] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:59:37. [Issue ID 264236]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Norton says he can lift hundreds of times his own weight.
One of the cockroaches complains what he is reading is juvenile pap.
Fizzo casts a spiel instead of a spell.
Wilbur puts on a banana peel and thinks it compliments his eyes.
Barefootz experiences various situations.
Storfer invents a robot cockroach and Dolly brings her robot over and it steps on Storfer's robot.
Headrack gets his latest painting criticized by God.
Dolly asks a wrong number phone call out on a date.
Dolly thinks she's losing it.
Louise doesn't play a lyre because it would ruin her nails.
Lester talks about his grandma who has rigor mortis.
Headrack dreams of an idea for a new painting.
Barefootz discusses Santa Claus with the cockroaches and Glory.
Dolly and Headrack contemplate impersonal sexual encounters.
Barefootz puts up a bulletin board for the cockroaches.
The doctor uses a harpoon for acupuncture on Glory.
Glory has a change of behavior.
Glory's heart rate is a little off.
Barefootz and Dolly encounter a pan-handler wanting a handout.
Headrack has trouble drawing Barefootz mouth.
The cockroaches discuss rotten childhood experiences with Barefootz.
Dolly tries to change her attitude but still is sexually frustrated.
Headrack wants to paint the cockroach in their natural habitat, but they refuse and Cornelia volunteers to pose in a G-string and pasties.
